name: price_check
description: Look up current BMC/BROMYROS product pricing by SKU, product family, or product type. Returns price in USD (IVA 22% included). Source: bromyros_pricing_master.json (Level 1 authoritative).

query.description: Product SKU (e.g., 'ISODEC-100-1000'), family (e.g., 'ISODEC'), or free-text search

filter_type.description: Type of lookup to perform. Default: 'search'

thickness_mm.description: Optional: filter by panel thickness in mm
